Verify the table header for 'Product Name' displays text 'Product Name' with font size 14px, font weight 600, color #333333, and background color #f2f2f2

Verify the 'Next' pagination button is enabled

Verify the 'Cancel' button is enabled, has text 'Cancel', and background color #cccccc

Verify the 'Light Mode' label next to the toggle button becomes visible and has 10px margin-left
